channel.title: Symbol Organizer
channel.description: Organize your symbols page, and layer list, alphabetically and into groupings determined by your symbol names.

item.title: Version 13.1
item.description: • Display Group Titles will now prefer to use "SFProText-Bold" by default, and if the font doesn't exist, will fall back to "SFUIText-Bold", or "HelveticaNeue-Bold". Remove Unused Symbols will now only remove symbols on current page.
